videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: mtg player reacts to Yu-Gi-Oh's most busted deck
videos.description:
As a recommendation from @Cimoooooooo after this video (https://youtu.be/p66phrO0xzw?si=p9HNl8-UE3FKh-IN), I took some time and watched the finals of a Tearlaments mirror match and my freaking gawd is it crazy!

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: A Zombie deck you can play in Brawl or Commander
videos.description:
Temmet, Naktamun's Will is a precon commander that is also available on MTG Arena. Here is a build you can run in paper Magic: the Gathering commander or in Brawl on MTG Arena.

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/o-8calJdUEqbsU8nYBq8BA
